value.title: When optimizing Power BI don't forgot about CPU
value.excerpt: We talk about optimizations a LOT! We pile onto a question posed by Chris Webb - Should you optimize for CPU in Power BI? We think the answer is YES! Let's explain... value.title: Where are the Power BI Gateway logs? I thought I knew...
